column4: maulana@maulana-Lenovo-G460:/$  how to make like this maulana@G460:/$  on my terminal ?
maulana@maulana-Lenovo-G460:/$  how to make like this maulana@G460:/$  on my terminal ? please help me for ide
in your ~/.bashrc there is a line editing the PS1 variable, replace \h with G460 on that line then restart bash
or change your hostname as farchord suggested
